name: Tuurngaq
description:
So, you killed this creepy hermit, back in these frozen hills. Since then, something is hunting you. You did not see it yet, but your companions have disappeared one after the other. Some nights, you’d swear you hear a strange beast howl reverberating in the wind when you are trying to find your sleep. Or is it a man?… This thing is clever, for sure, and the weather is against you for several days. You will not make it…

A northern demon for Mörk Borg, inspired by Inuit traditions.

Created with the Fölk-Lore jam in mind.

Art by Jam.

It is published under the Mörk Borg Third Party License.
